target_markets.market_description: Startups and companies needing visual assets that convert
pain_points: visual assets that don't generate results
designers in Williamsburg apartments with thick glasses who create art instead of converting assets
target_markets.market_size_indicators: mentions working with multiple startups and companies

problems_validated.problem: Designers create visual assets that don't convert at all
problems_validated.severity: high - companies are hiring designers but getting no results
problems_validated.current_solutions: traditional designers who focus on aesthetics over conversion
problems_validated.market_gap: designers lack copywriting and marketing skills to create converting assets

problems_validated.problem: Familiarity blindness - business owners can't see problems with their own sales pages
problems_validated.severity: medium - affects ability to optimize conversion
problems_validated.current_solutions: looking at pages thousands of times without fresh perspective
problems_validated.market_gap: need external perspective to spot conversion issues

products_tools.name: Design Scientist
products_tools.use_case: provides visual assets that convert for startups and companies - brands, websites, mobile apps, infographics
products_tools.metrics: example shows 30 clicks to 3500 clicks, 1 page visit to 150 page visits, 0 sales to 10 sales generating 400k revenue

business_strategies.strategy: Design scientist model - one-third copywriter, one-third designer, one-third marketer
business_strategies.implementation: build team that combines all three skills instead of just artistic design
business_strategies.expected_results: visual assets that actually convert and generate revenue
business_strategies.case_study: Design Scientist helping other companies while needing help on their own website

business_strategies.strategy: Focus pages solely on getting calls/conversions rather than explaining everything
business_strategies.implementation: make call booking the primary and most visible action

problems_solutions.problem: Website conversion optimization - too many steps to desired action
problems_solutions.solution: Reduce steps and put call-to-action prominently at top of page
steps: identify the single goal of the page
consider removing explanatory content that doesn't drive action

problems_solutions.problem: Everything must earn its pixels on a webpage
problems_solutions.solution: Remove any element that doesn't improve the page when removed
steps: ask if page is better without it
delete elements that drag the page down

problems_solutions.problem: Telling instead of showing what you do
problems_solutions.solution: Use before/after examples instead of describing services
steps: show specific metrics (clicks, visits, sales, revenue)
use real results instead of generic descriptions

startup_ideas.target_market: entrepreneurs looking for validated business ideas
startup_ideas.problem_solved: lack of validated startup ideas that don't need investors
startup_ideas.validation: compiled from entrepreneurs who built hundred million plus businesses
startup_ideas.investment_needed: most ideas don't need a single investor, some cost nothing to start

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Putting fluffy text and unnecessary content on pages
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: elements drag the page down and hurt conversion
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: apply the 'earn its pixels' test to every element
mistakes_to_avoid.example: generic text like 'locate your Brands exist everywhere your customers and future customers are having conversations on the internet'

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Making too many steps to reach the desired action
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: put the main CTA prominently and reduce friction
mistakes_to_avoid.example: having call booking buried instead of prominently displayed

growth_tactics.tactic: Show don't tell - use before/after case studies with specific metrics
steps: display specific metrics (clicks, visits, sales, revenue)
growth_tactics.results_expected: better understanding of value proposition and higher conversions

metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: reduce steps and make CTA more prominent

trends_signals.trend: Need for conversion-focused design over aesthetic design
trends_signals.opportunity: designers who combine copywriting, design, and marketing skills

actionable_quotes.quote: everything needs to earn its pixels
actionable_quotes.actionability: test every element on your page - if removing it makes the page better, delete it

actionable_quotes.quote: I get like what's called like familiarity blindness so if I look at my own sales Pages I've seen them literally like 10,000 times I can't see anything wrong with them
actionable_quotes.context: why external perspective is needed for optimization
actionable_quotes.actionability: get outside perspective on your sales pages and marketing materials

actionable_quotes.quote: what if a designer wasn't just an artist so it's you know onethird copywriter oneir third designer and onethird marketer
actionable_quotes.actionability: combine multiple skills instead of focusing on just one discipline

key_statistics.statistic: Before: 30 clicks, 1 page visit, 0 sales. After: 3500 clicks, 150 page visits, 10 sales, 400k revenue
key_statistics.context: example of design scientist results improvement
